page.title: 10Entertainment at a distance
page.content: There are theatres in Hereford. Malvern, and Worcester, where amateur and professional companies perform. Every year there is a festival at Ludlow when leading professional companies perform works of Shakespeare in an open air theatre built inside Ludlow castle. Also there is a well attended music and drama festival in Malvern. The Three Choirs held each year is hosted by Hereford, Worcester, and Gloucester in turn. Choirs are formed from every part of the community. The three counties agricultural show also used to move around the counties but now has a permanent site just outide Malvern. A small minority visit London for shows, while others travel to Birmingham for theatres and the exhibition centre.
